title: 231 - Welcome To The ThunderDome
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys welcome AQ Shipley to the first episode of The Pod from The ThunderDome, as they give an update on the process of getting into the new office, some of the trials and tribulations of the whole process, what they're looking forward to, what's on the horizon, and what they've been up to before jumping into a loaded POD FOD that includes a UK man getting struck by lightning while playing video games in his living room, sinkholes popping up everywhere, sanctioned boxing matches inside of telephone booths, a Chick-Fil-A worker beating the piss out of a would be carjacker, bulls bulldozing unsuspecting civilians, hackers taking over Uber and Grand Theft Auto 6, some movie and TV talk, and more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.com/ThePodPMI to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all, we'll see you next Wednesday. Cheers
